title: Social Security Replacement Rate ≈ 40% × Final Salary
formula_raw: 8. Social Security Replacement Rate ≈ 40% × Final Salary

title: Human Life Value \(HLV\)
formula_raw: Annual Income × Years Left till Retirement

title: Marginal Tax Rate
formula_raw: Tax Rate on Last Income Slab

title: Purchasing Power Parity
formula_raw: Exchange Rate × \(Price Index A ÷ Price Index B\)

title: Big Mac Index
formula_raw: Price in Country A ÷ Price in Country B

title: Diversification Ratio
formula_raw: Portfolio Std Dev ÷ Weighted Avg Std Dev

title: Wealth Growth Rate
formula_raw: \(End Net Worth − Start Net Worth\) ÷ Years

title: __Calorie Needs__
formula_raw: Protein Cal \+ Carb Cal \+ Fat Cal

title: __Tennis First Serve %__
formula_raw: First Serves In ÷ First Serves Attempted

title: __Operating Cash Flow__
formula_raw: Net Income \+ Non\-Cash Expenses − ΔWorking Capital

title: __Focus Ratio__
formula_raw: Deep Work Hours ÷ Total Work Hours

title: __Focus Time Ratio__
formula_raw: Deep Work Hours ÷ Total Work Hours

title: __Automation ROI %__
formula_raw: \(Time Saved × Cost per Hour − Cost\) ÷ Cost × 100

title: Algorithm Complexity ≈ O\(n\), O\(n log n\), etc\.
formula_raw: 10. Algorithm Complexity ≈ O\(n\), O\(n log n\), etc\.

title: __Water\-Cement Ratio \(w/c\)__
formula_raw: Weight of Water ÷ Weight of Cement

title: __Bitumen Content__
formula_raw: Weight of Bitumen ÷ Total Mix Weight × 100

title: __Profitability Index \(PI\)__
formula_raw: PV of Cash Inflows ÷ PV of Outflows

title: __Plinth Area__
formula_raw: External Building Area at Ground Floor

title: __Price\-to\-Income Ratio__
formula_raw: Median House Price ÷ Median Household Income

title: __Diversification Ratio__
formula_raw: Portfolio Std Dev ÷ Weighted Avg Std Dev

title: __Service Game Win %__
formula_raw: Service Games Won ÷ Service Games Played × 100

title: __Return Game Win %__
formula_raw: Return Games Won ÷ Return Games Played × 100

title: __Talk Time Balance %__
formula_raw: Person A Talk ÷ Person B Talk × 100
